articles.title: World Cup 2022: How football fever is gripping cricket-crazy India
articles.description: Fans are spending a fortune to travel to Doha to watch games and putting up cut-outs of players at home.
articles.content:
This week, Hashir Ali and 11 of his friends will make a long trip - from Kozhikode city in the southern state of Kerala to Doha, the capital of Qatar. 
Mr Ali, 55, a football-crazy civil engineer, a… [+5042 chars]

articles.title: England name Jon Lewis as women's team head coach - Reuters.com
articles.description: England named Jon Lewis as the new head coach of their women's cricket team on Friday.
articles.content:
Nov 18 (Reuters) - England named Jon Lewis as the new head coach of their women's cricket team on Friday.
The 47-year-old former England men's seamer will replace Lisa Keightley, who left the positi… [+506 chars]

articles.title: The Spin | Travis Basevi: the Statsguru visionary who transformed cricket
articles.description: The man behind Cricinfo’s search engine, who has died aged 47, was a one-off who paved the way for today’s data-driven gameTravis Basevi wasn’t the kind of man who sought the limelight. He was happy to just do his thing. And that thing was groundbreaking.Base…
